abstract: Cincinnati men's basketball coach Mick Cronin is cleared to resume activity after missing most of season due to problem with blood vessel in back of his brain; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati’s men’s basketball coach, Mick Cronin, missed most of the season because of a problem with a blood vessel in the back of his brain.
snippet: Cincinnati’s men’s basketball coach, Mick Cronin, missed most of the season because of a problem with a blood vessel in the back of his brain.
